sentences.cn: “这真令人难以忍受！”鲁弗斯爵士喊道。
艾美兴高采烈地叽叽喳喳说个不停,汤姆感到无法忍受.

sentences.en: For a breath of difference between us is intolerable.
sentences.cn: 因为我们之间的任何微小芥蒂都是无法容忍的.

sentences.en: He is the most intolerable scoundrel on the face of the earth.
sentences.cn: 他是世界上最下流的东西.

sentences.en: His illness placed an intolerable burden on his family.
sentences.cn: 他的病给家庭带来了无法承受的负担.
我觉得他的无礼令人无法容忍.

sentences.en: I've come to settle here finally , it's an intolerable town.
sentences.cn: 我后来就在这长住下来了, 这个城镇真叫人受不了.

sentences.en: It had been intolerable to be with him since then.
sentences.cn: 从此跟他在一起就如坐针毡.

sentences.en: It is an intolerable situation and it can't be allowed to go on.
sentences.cn: 这种情况忍无可忍，不能再任其继续下去了。

sentences.en: So changed was her state that the home atmosphere became intolerable.
sentences.cn: 她的处境发生了如此巨大的变化,使得家里的气氛变得无法忍受了.

sentences.en: That intolerable difference proscribed the word.
sentences.cn: 那种无法容忍的差别排斥了这个词.

sentences.en: The misery of lounging about with nowhere to go became intolerable.
sentences.cn: 在大街上到处闲逛又无处可去的痛苦,使他受不住了.

sentences.en: The restraint that she imposed upon herself was often intolerable.
sentences.cn: 她强加于自身的桎梏常常不可忍受.

sentences.en: They felt this would put intolerable pressure on them.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得这会给他们带来无法承受的压力。

sentences.en: Unless of course the whole situation became intolerable.
sentences.cn: 万一整个局势变得不能容忍,那当然就另当别论了.

words.tran_cn: 到难耐的程度；无法忍受地

trans.tran_cn: 不能忍受的，无法容忍的，不堪的，难堪
trans.tran_en: too difficult, bad, annoying etc for you to accept or deal with
